data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Japoshvili, George, Hansen, Lars Ove, Guerrieri, Emilio (2013): The Norwegian species of Copidosoma Ratzeburg (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Encyrtidae). Zootaxa 3619 (2): 145-153, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3619.2.3
